title: Another Russian region declares emergency as Ukraine offensive enters second week
description: The governor of Belgorod says daily Ukrainian attacks have destroyed houses and killed civilians.

title: Rape and murder of doctor in hospital spark protests in India
description: The rape and murder of a female doctor in India highlight the violence against healthcare workers.

title: Japan set for new PM as Kishida bows out as party leader
description: Support for Fumio Kishida has fallen amid a huge corruption scandal that hit his party.

title: NZ charity unknowingly distributes meth-laced sweets
description: Police are racing to recover the sweets, which may have been distributed to up to 400 people.

title: Pianist's Melbourne show cancelled over Gaza remarks
description: Jayson Gillham dedicated a piece of music to journalists killed in Gaza.

title: US soldier pleads guilty to selling secrets to China
description: Sgt Korbein Schultz was allegedly paid $42,000 in exchange for dozens of sensitive security data.

title: Weather presenter speaks out about on-air panic attack
description: ABC News Breakfast's Nate Byrne speaks with the BBC about how he handled the on-air moment.

title: China firm claims world's fastest-charging EV battery
description: Zeekr says its new batteries can be charged from 10% to 80% in 10 and a half minutes using its chargers.

title: US says it aims to 'lower temperature' in Middle East
description: The US is stepping up its efforts to reach a ceasefire deal between Israel and Hamas in Gaza.

title: Israeli minister denounced over call for Jewish prayer at Jerusalem holy site
description: Itamar Ben-Gvir visited the al-Aqsa Mosque compound with Israelis who defied a ban on Jewish prayer.

title: Spain investigating Katy Perry for filming video in protected sand dunes
Baby twins killed in Gaza as father registered births
description: The twins were just four days old when their home was bombed in an Israeli air strike.

title: 'Squad' member Ilhan Omar holds off primary challenge
description: Two other members of the progressive group of Democrats lost primaries earlier this year.

title: We entered easily, say Ukrainian troops involved in Russia incursion
description: Ukrainian troops who entered Russia's Kursk this past week say they took the Russians by surprise.

title: Despair as the sea slowly swallows a Kenyan beauty spot
description: Local authorities are seeking to build a seawall to prevent further intrusion of the ocean to the village.

title: Is Kamala Harris a 'failed border tsar'?
description: Trump blasts her for failing to secure the southern border, but supporters say that wasn't her mission.

title: TikTok gave me the confidence to perform at Edinburgh Fringe
description: A group of TikTokers who've honed their craft online are bringing their comedy to the real world.

title: Ukraine war in maps: Counter-offensive into Russian territory
description: As Russian forces make slow progress in eastern Ukraine, Ukraine's military stages a surprise cross-border attack.

title: The rise and fall of North Korea - the sleeping giant of women's football
description: North Korea lags behind most of the rest of the world in several areas. But the hermit state has had an outsized impact on international women's football.

title: Hong Kong loves to hate its cabbies - can polite ambassadors help?
description: Ask anyone in Hong Kong what they like least about their city - taxi drivers will likely be high on the list.
